[Aliases("AfkDel")]

AfkTimeout(StoopidTime)

Sets the timeout duration before a user is no longer considered afk. Triggers when a user sends a message or types in a channel.

Declaration

[Aliases("AfkTimeout")]

CustomAfkMessage(string)

Sets a custom AFK embed that will be displayed when a user is AFK. Use "-" to reset to the default embed. Check https://eb.mewdeko.tech for the embed builder and http://mewdeko.tech/placeholders for placeholders.

Declaration
[Cmd("CustomAfkMessage")]
[Aliases("CustomAfkMessage")]
[UserPerm(GuildPermission.Administrator)]
public Task CustomAfkMessage(string embedCode)
Parameters
Type Name Description
string embedCode

The custom message to set. Use "-" to reset to the default message.
Returns
Type Description
Task
Examples

.afkmsg -

.afkmsg embedcode
